General.Name: Maithan Alloys Limited
General.Description: Maithan Alloys Limited manufactures and exports ferro alloys. The company provides ferro manganese, silico manganese, and ferro silicon products. It is also involved in the generation and supply of wind power. The company serves steel companies in India and internationally. Maithan Alloys Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Kolkata, India.

1.Name: Mr. Subodh  Agarwalla B.Tech., M.B.A., MBA
1.Title: CEO & Whole Time Director
